metadata.title: CVE-2021-30597 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Browser UI in Google Chrome on Chrome prior to92.0.4515.131 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via physical access to the device.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
